text: <@U02162GK9SP> how to add search to site header

CMS Hub has search capabilities built-in. A default module is available to make it easy to add search to your site. If you need to do advanced things like limit the search results to certain types of pages like blog posts or prevent some content from being indexed you can. Learn more at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/features/content-search>
